title: What about tomorrow?
creator_credit: Dave Smallin and A Dave Smallin Production
brief_description: The consumption of alcohol by adolescents is the subject of this dramatized open-ended film. The influences upon teenagers to take up drinking are indicated and one young man is confronted with the possible long term effects of alcohol misuse.
creator_credit_for_label: Dave Smallin and A Dave Smallin Production
